subject: Online store offers special discounts
body:
Dear customer.
FDA warns that the number of underground Web pharmacies selling low-quality medications is growing. Luckily, there are still some Internet drugstores that we can rely on.
Our advice for everyone shopping for medications on the Web is to cling to reliable licensed pharmacies that have been operating on the Internet market for quite a long time already (such as CanadianPharmacy). Want to save on drugs? Try CanadianPharmacy - #1 discount Canadian pharmacy.
Learn to save on medications without having to risk your health shop at CanadianPharmacy.
Yours,Aron Cody
